name: gamebridge-voice
description: Cross-platform gaming voice chat app for Xbox and PlayStation players

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:mobile" "npm run dev:desktop"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:mobile && npm run build:desktop
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:mobile && npm run install:desktop
